forum.content:
Leonard Cohen
流浪詩人 兼 歌手
喜歡他低沉迷人的嗓音
也喜歡他的詩
最喜歡他說過的一句話 “ There is a crack in everything ,that's how the lights get in"

urls.description: Music video for Leonard Cohen's song "Dance Me To The End of Love" from his album "Various Positions
urls.title: "Dance Me To The End of Love" Leonard Cohen

forum.title: Dance me to the end of love
